name: Square Root (PromZona)
description:
Try to return Square Root to mathematicians. You will face several witches along the way,  who will try to stop you. But it is only your choice - who will receive Square Root in the end.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Mouse Button - Push ability
  • Right Mouse Button - Activate equation

How to play:

  • Avoid Witch Bolts by walking.
  • Push Witches and Witch Bolts. when you need to. 
  • To Activate Equation: creature should be in the circle, then press Right Click on the equation to activate it.
  • Clear whole room to have access to the next one. 
  • In the end: choose who will receive Square Root

Credits:

  • Andrey Essaulov - Programming
  • Anna Filipchuk - Art, Music
